name: Squeaky Ninja - Tricky Floor Lava Challenge
name_original: Squeaky Ninja - Tricky Floor Lava Challenge
description:
Help the Squeaky Ninja collect all the stars in this addictive new game!

How to Play
● Tap to jump and collect all the stars to beat the level!
● Hold down to jump higher and to stay elevated!
● Avoid the shurikens at all cost!

Features
● Easy to learn gameplay
● Perfect game to play with 1 hand
● Casual game suitable for all ages!

Download Squeaky Ninja now and let's play!

Follow us for updates and new games!
